text: How to Turn the Complex Mathematics of Vector Calculus Into Simple Pictures
translation: 如何将向量微积分的复杂数学转换为简单图片

text: Feynman diagrams revolutionized particle physics. Now mathematicians want to do the same for vector calculus.
translation: 费曼图彻底改变了粒子物理学。 现在，数学家希望对矢量微积分做同样的事情。

text: By Emerging Technology from the arXiv
Back in 1948, the journal Physical Review published a paper entitled “Space-Time Approach…
translation: 早在1948年，《物理评论》杂志就发表了一篇题为《时空方法》的论文。

text: (本文翻译自MIT Technology Review的文章《How to Turn the Complex Mathematics of Vector Calculus Into Simple Pictures》，参考：https://medium.com/mit-technology-review/how-to-turn-the-complex-mathematics-of-vector-calculus-into-simple-pictures-f3ea8d8b3830)
translation: （本文翻译自《 MIT技术评论》的文章《如何将向量微积分的复杂数学转变为简单图片》，参考：https：//medium.com/mit-technology-review/how-to-turn-the-complex- 向量演算的数学到简单图片中（f3ea8d8b3830）
